title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Duxford Airfield (EGSU) - version 1.0
description:
In this video we will have a look at one of the most detailed airport there currently is for MSFS 2020. It is Duxford Airfield (EGSU).

The airfield looks to be an old military aircraft which can now be used by civilians based on some information I found. The level of details of each component is really magnificent.

Besides the airfield you will find IWM Duxford which is Europe's largest air museum. 

If you want to add more cool things I would recommend you to add the Duxford airshow also which add multiple additional airplanes to the scenery.

First want to look if it is something for you have a look at the video and decide afterwards.

If you want to try the addons yourself download them via the link below:

Duxford Airfield (EGSU) - complete
https://flightsim.to/file/28581/egsu-duxford-airfield-complete-edition

Duxford airshow
https://flightsim.to/file/22075/egsu-duxford-airshow-addon
